info.title: Youtube_Twitter_Backend
info.description: API For Backend of Youtube and Twitter.

post.description: Register a user with multiple file uploads (avatar and cover image).
Authenticate user and return access/refresh tokens.
Logout user and invalidate refresh token.
Refresh access token using refresh token.

get.description: Get the currently logged in user.

post.description: Change the current password of the logged in user.

patch.description: Update fullname and email of the logged in user
Update avatar of the logged in user
Update cover image of the logged in user

get.description: Get channel profile of a user by username
Get the watch history of the logged in user

post.description: Seed the database with dummy users.

get.description: Get the credentials of the seeded users.
Check if the server is up and running
Get all tweets of a user

delete.description: Delete a tweet by its ID

403.description: You are not allowed to delete this tweet

patch.description: Update a tweet by its ID

400.description: Content field is missing or Tweet ID is invalid

get.description: Get all channels a user is subscribed to
Get all subscribers of a channel

post.description: Publish a video with a title, description, video file and thumbnail.

get.description: Get a single video by its ID.

delete.description: Delete a video by its ID.

patch.description: Update a video's title, description and thumbnail by its ID.
Toggle the publish status of a video by its ID.

get.description: Get all comments for a video

post.description: Add a comment to a video

delete.description: Delete a comment by its ID

patch.description: Update a comment by its ID

get.description: Get all videos liked by the user

401.description: Unauthorized or Same named playlist are now allowed

get.description: Get a playlist by its ID

delete.description: Delete a playlist by its ID

403.description: You are not allowed to modify this playlist

patch.description: Update a playlist by its ID

403.description: You are not allowed to modify this playlist

patch.description: Add a video to a playlist

400.description: Invalid Playlist or Video ID or Video already in the Playlist

403.description: You are not allowed to modify this playlist

patch.description: Remove a video from a playlist

400.description: Invalid Playlist or Video ID or Video doesn't exist in playlist

403.description: You are not allowed to modify this playlist

get.description: Get all playlists of a user
Get statistics for the logged in channel
Get all videos for the logged in channel

delete.description: This action is NOT UNDOABLE. It will drop all collections and delete the credentials file.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Database drop failed
